## PhD Researcher
<span style="font-size:1.15rem; color:#4b5563;">
Granular Flow Â· DEM Simulations Â· Pattern Formation

**Research Focus:** Granular rheology (particle shape & friction), Secondary flow, Shear-induced alignment, Stress anisotropy,  DEM workflows

I investigate rheology and microstructure in sheared granular media with varying particle shape, size and friction, using DEM simulations (MercuryDPM). My work focuses on secondary flow, stress anisotropy, particle alignment, and free-surface morphology, combining microâ€“macro analysis with continuum fields (velocity, strain-rate, stress) extracted by coarse-graining.
I develop Python-based post-processing and 3D visualization tools for large simulation datasets.

**Currently:** PhD Researcher (Germany)
